languages.text: "Надеюсь, Ваша Светлость всем довольна и еще не успела устать? Если вы желаете освежиться, осмелюсь предложить вам проследовать во двор — многие гости предпочли переместиться на свежий воздух и будут счастливы принести вам свои поздравления".

traits.locale_text: "Надеюсь, Ваша милость всем довольна и еще не успела устать?"

languages.text: "I hope Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is pleased and not yet tired? If you wish to revive yourself a little, I would suggest proceeding to the courtyard, if I may be so bold — many guests have chosen to move into the fresh air and will be eager to offer you their congratulations."
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, Ваша Светлость всем довольна и еще не успела устать? Если вы желаете освежиться, осмелюсь предложить вам проследовать во двор — многие гости предпочли переместиться на свежий воздух и будут счастливы принести вам свои поздравления".

traits.locale_text: "I hope that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is pleased and not yet tired?"
"I hope that Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is pleased and not yet tired?"

"I hope Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is pleased and not yet tired? If you wish to revive yourself a little, I would suggest proceeding to the courtyard, if I may be so bold — many guests have chosen to move into the fresh air and will be happy to offer you their congratulations."

"I hope Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is pleased and not yet tired? If you wish to revive yourself a little, I would suggest proceeding to the courtyard, if I may be so bold — many guests have chosen to move into the fresh air and will be happy to offer you their congratulations."

"I hope Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is pleased and not yet tired? If you wish to revive yourself a little, I would suggest proceeding to the courtyard, if I may be so bold — many guests have chosen to move into the fresh air and will be eager to offer you their congratulations."

languages.text: 「陛下にお喜びいただけているといいのですが、お疲れではありませんか？少し気分を回復されたいなら、恐縮ですが、中庭に出てみてはいかがでしょうか。多くのゲストが新鮮な空気にあたることを選んでいますし、ゲストの方々はぜひ、陛下にお祝い申し上げたいそうです」
languages.original_text: "I hope Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is pleased and not yet tired? If you wish to revive yourself a little, I would suggest proceeding to the courtyard, if I may be so bold — many guests have chosen to move into the fresh air and will be eager to offer you their congratulations."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下にお喜びいただけているといいのですが、お疲れではありませんか？少し気分を回復されたいなら、恐縮ですが、中庭に出てみてはいかがでしょうか。多くのゲストが新鮮な空気にあたることを選んでいますし、ゲストの方々はぜひ、陛下にお祝い申し上げたいそうです」

languages.text: “大人，到目前为止，一切都还满意吧？您是否感到疲倦？如果您想稍事休息，我不揣冒昧建议您移步庭院，小憩片刻。那里的空气清新宜人，许多宾客正恭候大驾，迫不及待地要向您致以祝贺了。”
languages.original_text: "I hope Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is pleased and not yet tired? If you wish to revive yourself a little, I would suggest proceeding to the courtyard, if I may be so bold — many guests have chosen to move into the fresh air and will be eager to offer you their congratulations."

traits.locale_text: “大人，到目前为止，一切都还满意吧？您是否感到疲倦？如果您想稍事休息，我不揣冒昧建议您移步庭院，小憩片刻。那里的空气清新宜人，许多宾客正恭候大驾，迫不及待地要向您致以祝贺了。”

languages.text: «Espero que mi{mf|lord|lady} esté satisfech{mf|o|a} y todavía no se haya cansado. Si necesita recuperar fuerzas, permítame recomendarle humildemente un paseo por el patio. Muchos de sus invitados han decidido aprovechar el aire fresco y arden en deseos de darle la enhorabuena».
languages.original_text: "I hope Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is pleased and not yet tired? If you wish to revive yourself a little, I would suggest proceeding to the courtyard, if I may be so bold — many guests have chosen to move into the fresh air and will be eager to offer you their congratulations."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que mi{mf|lord|lady} esté satisfech{mf|o|a} y todavía no se haya cansado. Si necesita recuperar fuerzas, permítame recomendarle humildemente un paseo por el patio. Muchos de sus invitados han decidido aprovechar el aire fresco y arden en deseos de darle la enhorabuena».

languages.text: « J'espère que Votre Seigneurie est satisfaite ? Si vous n'êtes pas trop {mf|fatigué|fatiguée} et que vous souhaitez vous revigorer, puis-je vous suggérer de vous rendre dans la cour ? De nombreux invités attendent de pouvoir vous y présenter leurs félicitations. »
languages.original_text: "I hope Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is pleased and not yet tired? If you wish to revive yourself a little, I would suggest proceeding to the courtyard, if I may be so bold — many guests have chosen to move into the fresh air and will be eager to offer you their congratulations."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que Votre Seigneurie est satisfaite ? Si vous n'êtes pas trop {mf|fatigué|fatiguée} et que vous souhaitez vous revigorer, puis-je vous suggérer de vous rendre dans la cour ? De nombreux invités attendent de pouvoir vous y présenter leurs félicitations. »

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, alles ist zur Zufriedenheit Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, und Ihr seid noch nicht müde? Falls Ihr Euch ein wenig erholen wollt, würde ich den Hof vorschlagen, wenn Ihr gestattet – viele Gäste suchen dort frische Luft und würden Euch sicher gerne ihre Glückwünsche aussprechen."
languages.original_text: "I hope Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is pleased and not yet tired? If you wish to revive yourself a little, I would suggest proceeding to the courtyard, if I may be so bold — many guests have chosen to move into the fresh air and will be eager to offer you their congratulations."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, alles ist zur Zufriedenheit Eurer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, und Ihr seid noch nicht müde? Falls Ihr Euch ein wenig erholen wollt, würde ich den Hof vorschlagen, wenn Ihr gestattet – viele Gäste suchen dort frische Luft und würden Euch sicher gerne ihre Glückwünsche aussprechen."

languages.text: "Umarım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri hoşnuttur ve henüz yorulmamıştır. Haddimi aşmayacaksam, canlanmak isterseniz avluya geçmenizi öneririm. Birçok misafir, temiz hava almak için dışarı çıktı. Onlar da tebriklerini sunmak isteyecektir."
languages.original_text: "I hope Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} is pleased and not yet tired? If you wish to revive yourself a little, I would suggest proceeding to the courtyard, if I may be so bold — many guests have chosen to move into the fresh air and will be eager to offer you their congratulations."

traits.locale_text: "Umarım {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri hoşnuttur ve henüz yorulmamıştır. Biraz canlanmak istiyorsanız, haddimi de aşmadan avluya geçmenizi öneririm. Birçok misafir temiz hava almak için dışarı çıktı, onlar da tebriklerini sunmak isteyecektir eminim."
